question: Which form of cancer have paclitaxel, docetaxel, doxorubicin, and epirubicin been approved for?
ideal_answer:
Paclitaxel, docetaxel, doxorubicin, and epirubicin have been longstanding, Food and Drug Administration (FDA)-approved therapies against 
Triple negative breast cancer.

snippets.text: Paclitaxel, docetaxel, doxorubicin, and epirubicin have been longstanding, Food and Drug Administration (FDA)-approved therapies against TNBC.
